name: Myrcene
description: Myrcene is a common terpene with an earthy aroma often found across many classic cultivars.

name: Limonene
description: Limonene is known for a citrus-forward aroma that shows up in many upbeat, flavorful profiles.

name: Caryophyllene
description: Caryophyllene brings a peppery edge and is a frequent contributor to bold, gassy profiles.

name: Pinene
description: Pinene has a fresh pine aroma and is common in bright, botanical terpene blends.

name: Linalool
description: Linalool is a floral terpene that can add a soft, aromatic note to a strainâ€™s overall profile.
